sentence.Network_en: There is no earthly reason why they should ever change.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们完全没有必要作出改变。

sentence.Network_en: What earthly reason would they have for lying?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们到底为什么要撒谎呢？

sentence.Network_en: They lived in an earthly paradise.

lj.lj_ly: she wouldn't stand an earthly if she tried to outrun him.
lj.lj_ls: 她要想超过他是毫无希望的。

entry.def: Earthly means happening in the material world of our life on earth and not in any spiritual life or life after death.

example.ex: ...the need to confront evil during the earthly life...
example.tran: 需要在尘世生活中直面邪恶

example.ex: They lived in an earthly paradise.

entry.tran: （用于no earthly reason等短语中表示强调）根本，绝对
entry.def: Earthly is used for emphasis in phrases such as no earthly reason. If you say that there is no earthly reason why something should happen, you are emphasizing that there is no reason at all why it should happen.

example.ex: There is no earthly reason why they should ever change...
example.tran: 他们完全没有必要作出改变。

example.ex: What earthly reason would they have for lying?...
example.tran: 他们到底为什么要撒谎呢？

means.word_mean: 1. of or belonging to or characteristic of this earth as distinguished from heaven;

sentences.sentence: "believed that our earthly life is all that matters"

auth_sentence.content: Sculptures of divine workmanship...the earthly image of Uranian love.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sculptures of divine workmanship...the earthly image of Uranian love.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sculptures of divine workmanship...the earthly image of Uranian love.

auth_sentence.content: This earthly joy was being...transformed into a heavenly joy.
auth_sentence.res_content: This earthly joy was being...transformed into a heavenly joy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This earthly joy was being...transformed into a heavenly joy.

auth_sentence.content: The Garden of Earthly Delights,'  Kromer said.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Garden of Earthly Delights,' Kromer said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Garden of Earthly Delights,'  Kromer said.

means.word_mean: ( 用于强调) 毫无用处( 或道理等)

sentences.en: There’s no earthly reason why she shouldn’t come with us.
sentences.cn: 她完全没有理由不跟我们一块儿来。

sentences.en: You haven’t an earthly chance of beating her at tennis—she is one of the best players in the country.
sentences.cn: 你根本不可能在网球赛中打败她─她是全国最好的选手之一。

sentences.en: ‘Any chance of getting a ticket for the concert?’ ‘Not an earthly, I’m afraid.’
sentences.cn: “有可能弄到一张音乐会的票吗？”“恐怕没有任何办法。”
